website_summaries.verdict: A great value on a good cap that fits like you've already broken it in.
pros: Velcro strap adjustment in the back
A simple and inexpensive way to show your patriotic spirit on the Fourth of July
cons: This is not a low profile hat
It also cannot be shipped internationally

customer_reviews.title: Hat has a strange odor..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hat for the Fourth of July. I read on a review before I ordered it, that the had an odor. I really wanted the hat, but thought maybe it was just that person's order. When I received the hat and opened it, it smelled odd. I can't even define the odor. It certainly didn't smell like a new product. It was made in China, so who knows what it is really made out of... It's too bad, because the hat is really cute. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The hat looks exactly like the picture. It was beautiful but there was an odor that came along with the hat. It smelled so bad when I took it out of the packaging that I threw it away. I wasn’t sure who touched it or where it’s been to be smelling the way it was.
customer_reviews.author: Nance

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED HATS WON'T ORDER AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: There were two of these I have returned. One is Blue/White/BROWN and the other was Blue/White/ORANGE very cheap quality of material as if the paint on the material changed colors I prefer to find some local business I can physically look/touch before buying
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Oh Beautiful, for Covering Heads.....
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of this cap. It is quality made and fits well. I also like the flexibility of a velcro adjustment strap, as opposed to the usual plastic peg and hole. The only thing I don't like is that because the material is unspecified in the description, I failed to notice what it is made from. It is 100% polyester, for better or worse.
customer_reviews.author: The Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is worth the value. It fits although it feels a little rough on the inside when I put it on, so that gets the 4 stars; everything else is 5 stars. Purchased for Memorial Day since we can wear USA flag material to work to honor our Veterans. I’ll wear it anytime afterwards of course. I am pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good hat, good value, flimsy shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I like the hat.Its well made & the design is awesome.The problem why I didn't give it a 5,the shipping.It was sent just wrapped in plastic bag.It came misshapen.the bill is crooked.I hope I can reshape it.shouldve sent in a box like other hats I've received.
customer_reviews.author: barry fineberg

customer_reviews.title: 'Merica
customer_reviews.text: When I put this baby on I feel George Washington come alive inside of me, I feel the south rising again. It's almost like a bald eagle just saved me from a bunch of terrorist and got me a cheeseburger, this hat will make you more American than you think. You'll buy this bad boy thinking it's gonna be a "Good 4th of July item" no, youre going to be wearing this hat 5 times a week with absolutely no shame. 'MERICA!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this hat at all
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this hat at all. The colors are so dull and faded not at all what the picture shows. The hat in the picture is nice and bright red and the blue is a nice navy not the hat I received at all. I would not buy this hat again, I may even send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Quality for price exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Team USA in a Ryder Cup type golf event. They were a big hit. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful!
customer_reviews.text: We get these for our students going to visit Washington DC in the Spring. The group really stands out in the crowd!
customer_reviews.author: R Neighbors

customer_reviews.title: All around nice cap.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cap! It's well made and the bill is already rounded. Unique design. Very reasonable price. Very fast shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Coleman

customer_reviews.title: color not as bright as picture.
customer_reviews.text: great hat fit well and is made well, the color is faded and not as bright as the picture
customer_reviews.author: Experienced  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic
customer_reviews.text: looks great. fits well. a little small in overall size. Wore all 4th of July boat trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great hat at bargain price. Good quality. Feels like it should be nicely durable.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: A nice hat
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for his birthday and loved the bright colors. It also seems like it will wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: The inside of My hat arrived dirty!! Smh I had to wash it myself
customer_reviews.text: The inside of My hat arrived dirty!! Smh I had to wash it myself, other than that it fits perfectly and looks really cute on. It also arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Britt B

customer_reviews.title: Feels like cardboard
customer_reviews.text: It fits, but feels pretty stiff. I like how it looks, but geels kind of cheap, like cardboard. Not going to purchase any more of these.
customer_reviews.author: LCU

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic hats
customer_reviews.text: I needed some very inexpensive, patriotic baseball hats. These served the purpose.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Came in just like i expected it to look like. Now ready to rock it for 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Lara

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Attractive Patrotic Hat
customer_reviews.text: Good looking hat for a very reasonable price. Looked great for the 4th of July. Perfect for patriotic days and events or just to show pride in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Flash G

customer_reviews.title: USA All The Way❣🇺🇲
customer_reviews.text: Nice Fit! Sharp Design of Our Flag! Great Buy! A Must for Patriots, and All..!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son's birthday party as he wanted an America theme party and this was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great cap! I love that the colors are kinda ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cap! I love that the colors are kinda muted/faded...gives it a different look.
customer_reviews.author: lmsmama

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't real pleased with this purchase. The colors are not as vibrant as shown in picture. This cap pinches in the front by my temples. So not real comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This cap is super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cap for my dad, and he loves it! The colors are vibrant, and the cap is well made, with an adjustable headband. I would recommend this cap to any good American!
customer_reviews.author: Rex Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Received my package today with the enclosed USA baseball hats , love them , clean , look great and stylish , not cheap as some baseball hats can look. Only issue I have was I am sure the package had been opened , the baseball hats inside were visable through the cellotape binding that had been used to bind the envelope after being ripped open
customer_reviews.author: Hephaistion

customer_reviews.title: 'MERICA
customer_reviews.text: How else would I show my patriotism without this Made-In-China American hat? There's no way! You'd be ridiculous not to own this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This hat showed up horribly dirty/dingy. The material was faded and it's very ...
customer_reviews.text: This hat showed up horribly dirty/dingy. The material was faded and it's very cheaply made. Extremely disappointed. Will not purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect We'll made not junk.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Well made hat. Everyone really liked these hats that I bought for our 4th of July party.
customer_reviews.author: 2008_H3_Hummer_#1_DJE

customer_reviews.title: Where did you buy that hat?
customer_reviews.text: Many People have come up to me asking me where did I find this hat? Which store? When I tell them that I bought this on Amazon they often reply that they planned to buy one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Strommoro

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Hat fits great and looks sharp. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jerry Harper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cap. It matches a leather bomber jacket I have.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Should have looked closer
customer_reviews.text: The hat itself is good, however I wear "Low-profile" hats and this was not. I also made the mistake of buying a solid canvas hat. We need the mesh back ones for the heat in the south.
customer_reviews.author: GusBros

customer_reviews.title: Good quality workmenship!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Thank you! We will be wearing them the 3rd and 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A. McKenna-Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality hat
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality hat, @ a great price and arrived in a timely manner as well. Very pleased!TY for the great customer service! God bless, Billy & Donna
customer_reviews.author: Donna V

customer_reviews.title: BAD HAIR DAY HAT!
customer_reviews.text: This hat has been a live saver for those bad hair days. I can grab it on the way out and have something fun to wear.

customer_reviews.title: Very proud to wear it..
customer_reviews.text: Very popular with folks on this patriotic weekend. Fits great.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great Hat. Great price. Yea, America! We are so blessed to live here!

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new hat and says he gets compliments on it.

customer_reviews.title: MERICA
customer_reviews.text: If you've never owned an American flag hat in your entire life, can you even call yourself an American?

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? It fits well and has the good o'l stars and bars. Perfection in the form of headwear

customer_reviews.title: Colors
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad hat. Thought the colors would be brighter. Also has the "redneck bill", like to bend the bill to my own liking. Definitely a fall, winter, early spring hat.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. Not the best made hat ever but it looks cool and I love wearing it on the 4th of July!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth H

customer_reviews.title: Amrican Flag hat
customer_reviews.text: My hat arrived earlier than expected and it is exactly what I was hoping for. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: jerrykeesler

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy the new American Flag hat I received in very ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the new American Flag hat I received in very short order after ordering. The one draw back is the tightness of the curved bill against the sides of my head after wearing the hat for an hour or two. The curve is a bit too curved. Other than that I enjoy wearing it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: It is a little stiffer than I'm used to, but I think with a couple of washings I am hoping it will soften up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: I really love America and am all for the American flag so ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love America and am all for the American flag so I figured I'd buy this hat to go along with the rest of my American flag collection. It's a wonderful hat and I absolutely love it. The only down fall is, the colors are not as bright and it is a little big, but it might depend on the person. But I do love that it has an adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat should have bought more than one
customer_reviews.text: I just received this hat and I really like it. Nice design and good quality for the money. This hat is 100% polyester not cotton so it's a little stiff. I like it enough that I may buy a few more for friends to wear on the 4th
customer_reviews.author: JM Bunkin

customer_reviews.title: USA flag hat is KQQL
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hat and it really goes well with all the flag sun glasses I ordered...I am just a very patriotic Vietnam Vet.

customer_reviews.title: Love this hat
customer_reviews.text: Love that it does Not have mesh in the back
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Pierce

customer_reviews.title: This hat is really cute. Although it took a ...
customer_reviews.text: This hat is really cute. Although it took a while to get here it was worth the wait. Estimated delivery from my order placed on May 26th was May 29th to June 3rd. It arrived today, June 8th so now I have it for the Fourth of July!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.  You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Felt and looked like it was made from paper. Colors were very faded. I returned it.

customer_reviews.title: That I'm a American
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cap a lot makes me proud to be a American thank you so much.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a mans sized hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat was way too big for a female. This hat was too big for a woman to wear. Though it was adjustable, it did not fit. Seemed well constructed.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Quality is what you would expect for the price. I ordered two for a holiday trip. Colors werent as bright as pictured. They smelled terrible when we got them, but I was afraid if I washed them they would fall apart.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the 4th of July!

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice hat. The colors are bright

customer_reviews.title: The wave is not bright red and look more like maroon. Not reflective of an American flag

customer_reviews.title: I feel so 'Merican when I wear this

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: caps purchased as part of a project to remember our ...
customer_reviews.text: caps purchased as part of a project to remember our veterans in nursing homes with christmas gifts. one of the caps was given to a 95 year old woman who served in the marine corps in both world war II and korea. she has lost all her hair, and will wear the cap with pride.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat and fits great. Material is actually pretty thick and durable. Only downside it that is doesn't breath well so not the greatest on a hot day.

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the color of the hat you guys sent for me.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the color of the hat you guys sent for me. The color was good when I saw it in Amazon but too bad when it was delivered to me. You guys sent me the wrong color. product_meta.title: American Flag Patriotic Flag Baseball Cap/ Hat in Red, White and Navy Blue Stars and Wavy Stripes,OS, Red/White/Blue, One Size
product_meta.description: Brand New American Hat Cap Flag July 4th USA Independence Day Hat. 100% Cotton Adult sized fully velcro adjustable. Stars and Stripes.
feature_bullets: Includes (1) American Flag Patriotic Baseball Cap
